name: Notionable Notes Hub
description: What is the Notes Hub?The Notes Hub is a robust and integrated system for managing your notes, thoughts, and web bookmarks. You can use it to track:- Articles, videos, podcasts, and web pages you want to refer back to- Meeting Notes, Lecture Notes, and "Brain Dumps"These are all stored within relevant Books.The Notes Hub also helps you organize content and notes that are focused on helping you achieve your goals. For example, if one of your goals is to read more, you can save lists of books, art
